definition: to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.chinese: 現代人要向狗學習了說。

sentences.english: Neanderthals were primitive beings that lived alongside modern man 30, 000 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 穴居人是30萬年前和現代人同時存在的原始人類。

sentences.english: Homo erectus was also physically similar to modern humans with large brains and bodies.
sentences.chinese: 直立人具有大的腦髓，身體特徵也與現代人相似。

sentences.english: We can examine closely the moderns social and cultural psychology through the network la…
sentences.chinese: 透過網絡語言可以審視現代人的社會文化心理。

sentences.english: I just see a group of modern people wearing ancient costumes and performing.
sentences.chinese: 我感覺就是看一羣現代人穿着古裝在表演而已。

sentences.english: Some old folks are more skilled than younger people.
sentences.chinese: 有些老輩的手藝確實比現代人要精湛。

sentences.english: Butterfly sofa, a showcase modern life stage.
sentences.chinese: 蝶變沙發，一個展示現代人的生活的舞臺。

sentences.english: Either way, it's clear that our modern diet is not always the most cardio-friendly.
sentences.chinese: 總之，現代人的飲食顯然不利於心臟健康。

sentences.english: Some of this--we tend to think,as modern people, that a written text is actually the best thing.
sentences.chinese: 我們現代人通常會認爲，文字資料是最可靠的。

sentences.english: Self-centeredness is responsible for many modern-day problems.
sentences.chinese: 現代人有很多問題都是人的自我中心造成的。

sentences.english: The author expounds the reality of Yan Di's image transmission with modern people's thinking and rationally.
sentences.chinese: 作者以現代人的思維去感受炎帝形象傳達的現實。

sentences.english: What people pursue nowadays is simplicity and nature, isn't it?.
sentences.chinese: 現代人不就追求反樸歸真嗎？簡單就是美。

sentences.english: In modern times Chinese people set off fireworks on celebrations such as a wedding or moving to a new home.
sentences.chinese: 現代人在喜慶時也放煙花，如婚禮和喬遷新居。

sentences.english: Nowadays, the lifestyle of modern people is busy, atwitter and strenuous.
sentences.chinese: 如今，現代人的生活是繁忙，緊張而又艱辛的。

sentences.english: Sacrificial hogs offer us a chance, I think, to reflect a bit on the art of living of modern man.
sentences.chinese: 我想，豬公倒也給現代人的生活美學帶來一點省思。

sentences.english: But someone said that the swordsman was a dream of the modern people.
sentences.chinese: 但是有人說武俠只是現代人的夢。

definition: habit/custom/usual practice/to be used to/CL:個|个[ge4]
immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
many and complicated/mired in minor details
